msg.msgText: NOTES: 1. "Name" is a required item. 2. All "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks. 3. By default the configuration items related to selection criteria, ClientAddress, ClientID, UserID, GroupID, CommonNames, and Protocol are disabled. One of the selection criteria must be specified to update a "ConnectionPolicy". 4. To disable a selection criteria that is in use, set the configuration item to an empty string. For example, "ClientID=" 5. For ClientID, UserID, GroupID and CommonNames configuration items, a single asterisk (*), specified at the end of the value, can be used to match 0 or more characters. For example, "UserID=*" or "ClientID=TestClient*" are valid. "GroupID=*sales" or "ClientID=Test*Client" are not valid. 6. The Client IP Address can contain an asterisk (*) or a comma-delimited list of IPv4 or IPv6 addresses or ranges, for example: 9.3.41.32,10.10.1.1-10.10.1.100. IPv6 addresses must be enclosed in square brackets. For example, [2001:db8::] 7. Use "imaserver list Plugin" to get a list of installed Protocol plug-ins.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
